message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO

This paper is about video captioning, which involves understanding the content of a video and generating a textual description of it. This task is related to computer vision (cs.CV) because it requires analyzing visual information, and natural language processing (cs.CL) because it involves generating text. The proposed approach uses reinforcement learning, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) that involves training agents to make decisions based on rewards. The hierarchical structure of the approach involves designing sub-goals and recognizing primitive actions, which is similar to the concept of hierarchical reinforcement learning (cs.LG). Finally, the approach could also be relevant to robotics (cs.RO) because it involves designing a system that can perform actions based on visual input.
